title: Breaking the Bank

thumbnailDetails.alt: Henry Stickmin Breaking the Bank Play Online

controls: Mouse: Click to choose an option and interact with the game.
content.howToPlay:
Henry Stickmin is standing outside a heavily guarded bank. His goal? Get inside and grab the loot. Your job? Pick one of the six crazy methods to break in. Each choice leads to a unique (and usually ridiculous) outcome.

Shovel : Good ol’ digging. What could possibly go wrong?Explosives: Blow a hole in the wall. Just be careful where you stand.Teleporter : Technology is cool, but does it always work?Laser Drill : Precision at its finest… or not.Disguise : Maybe the guards won’t notice a money bag with legs.Wrecking Ball : Classic destruction. Just hope no one sees it coming.

Spoiler alert: Every option ends in failure, but that’s the fun! There is no “right” answer here. Just enjoy the fails! Breaking the Bank is the first game in the Henry Stickmin series, setting the stage for Henry’s future (mis)adventures. And hey, pay attention to small details—some choices will reappear in later Henry Stickmin games.

fullContent: Home› FunnyBreaking the BankBy OnlineGames.ioMake Game Full ScreenRemember the good old days of Flash games? You’d fire up your browser, head straight to Newgrounds, and scroll through the latest wacky games. Maybe you just finished a game of Interactive Buddy or Fancy Pants Adventures and were looking for something new. Then you found it: Henry Stickmin: Breaking the Bank. A simple yet funny stick-figure game where every choice leads to chaos. That iconic Henry Stickmin art style, the goofy animations, and the trial-and-error gameplay made it an instant classic. Now, even after Flash is gone, you can still experience the fun right here on OnlineGames.io! No plug-ins needed!ControlsMouse: Click to choose an option and interact with the game.How to PlayHenry Stickmin is standing outside a heavily guarded bank. His goal? Get inside and grab the loot. And hey, pay attention to small details—some choices will reappear in later Henry Stickmin games.FeaturesSimple point-and-click gameplayQuick and fun 5 min gameClassic Henry Stickmin humor and stick-figure animations.Six hilarious ways to try (and fail) to break into the bank.Nostalgic Newgrounds-style Flash game experience.More Games Like ThisRelive the golden era of Flash games with Henry Stickmin: Breaking the Bank on OnlineGames.io. Whether you're playing it for the first time or diving back into childhood nostalgia, this game is always worth a laugh. Click to play and see which stupid choice you’ll make first! And, if you love Breaking the Bank, you should check out the rest of the Henry Stickmin series, including Escaping the Prison and Stealing the Diamond.  This article was updated on March 12, 20251 Player2DCrashCrazyDestroyFlashFreeFunFunnyStickman
